summary.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

span.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項提供會放在不符合的項目是溢位機制到溢位區域。 controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the into an overflow area. 只有在父工具列項目的可以移動或調整大小的使用者。Only toolbar elements within a parent can be moved or resized by the user. 是，這表示其標頭和物件的集合可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## 自訂工具列控制項Customizing the ToolBar Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[工具列的樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立內。The following example shows how to create a inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .
The band of the in which the toolbar is positioned.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位置中根據的值而定， ，和屬性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 當設，群組列表示中的資料列。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 當是，群組列代表的資料行。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之間的關聯性， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|頻外Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中的資料列位於。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具列上方有較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列左邊的較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指出在其中的資料行位於。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具列左邊的較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列上方有較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來放置內控制。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未明確設定此屬性，其值會由的順序中設定。If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the is set in the . 例如，如果您將兩個工具列放在未設定和屬性、 值將會是 0，這兩個工具列。For example, if you put two toolbars in a without setting the and properties, the value of will be 0 for both toolbars. 值將第一個工具列 0，1 表示第二個工具列。The value of will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar. 位置中根據的值而定， ，和屬性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 當設，群組列表示中的資料列。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 當是，群組列代表的資料行。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之間的關聯性， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|頻外Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中的資料列位於。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具列上方有較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列左邊的較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指出在其中的資料行位於。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具列左邊的較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列上方有較大的值會設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來放置內控制。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按首頁中的第一個項目接收鍵盤焦點。When the user presses HOME, the first item in the receives keyboard focus. 當使用者按結束時中的最後一個項目接收鍵盤焦點。When the user presses END, the last item in the receives keyboard focus. 當發生這種情況時，這個實作會將標示事件，如藉由設定處理屬性的事件資料至`true`。When this occurs, this implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

span.para: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作您實作。無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation. Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class. You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the loses mouse capture.

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

span.para: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作您實作。無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation. Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class. You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來變更預設樣式的控制項。Use this property to change the default style of controls on the . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.TextBoxStyleKey**`}"/>`<*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.TextBoxStyleKey**`}"/>` ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性，以建立如控制項。The following example uses this property to create a for controls on a .
